VALENTINE/NNP M'CLUTCHY,/NNP THE/DT IRISH/NNP AGENT./NNP By/IN William/NNP Carleton/NNP PREFACE/NNP It/PRP was/VBD not/RB my/PRP$ intention/NN to/TO have/VB written/VBN any/DT Preface/NNP to/TO this/DT book,/NN but/CC to/TO have/VB allowed/VBN it/PRP simply/RB to/TO speak/VB for/IN itself./PRP As/IN it/PRP is/VBZ very/RB likely,/JJ however,/, that/IN both/DT it/PRP and/CC the/DT motives/NNS of/IN its/PRP$ author/NN may/MD be/VB misrepresented/VBN by/IN bigoted/JJ or/CC venal/JJ pens,/NNS I/PRP think/VBP it/PRP necessary/JJ to/TO introduce/VB it/PRP to/TO the/DT reader/NN by/IN a/DT few/JJ brief/NN observations./VBZ In/IN the/DT first/JJ place,/NN then,/, I/PRP beg/VBP to/TO say,/VB that/IN the/DT work/NN presents/VBZ phases/NNS of/IN Irish/JJ life/NN and/CC manners/NNS that/WDT have/VBP never/RB been/VBN given/VBN to/TO the/DT public/NN before/IN by/IN any/DT other/JJ writer/NN upon/IN the/DT same/JJ subject./NN So/IN far,/RB therefore,/, the/DT book/NN is/VBZ a/DT perfectly/RB new/JJ book--not/NN only/RB to/TO the/DT Irish/JJ people,/NNS but/CC also/RB to/TO the/DT English/NNP and/CC Scotch./NNP I/PRP know/VBP not/RB whether/IN the/DT authenticity/NN of/IN the/DT facts/NNS and/CC descriptions/NNS contained/VBN in/IN it/PRP may/MD be/VB called/VBN in/IN question;/NN but/CC this/DT I/PRP do/VBP know,/VBN that/IN there/EX is/VBZ not/RB an/DT honest/JJ man,/NN on/IN either/DT side,/NN who/WP has/VBZ lived/VBN in/IN the/DT north/NN of/IN Ireland,/NNP and/CC reached/VBD the/DT term/NN of/IN fifty/CD years,/NNS who/WP will/MD not/RB recognize/VB the/DT conduct/NN and/CC language/NN of/IN the/DT northern/JJ Orangemen/NNS as/IN just,/RB truthful,/NN and/CC not/RB one/CD whit/JJ exaggerated./. To/TO our/PRP$ friends/NNS across/IN the/DT Channel/NNP it/PRP is/VBZ only/RB necessary/JJ to/TO say,/VB that/IN I/PRP was/VBD born/VBN in/IN one/CD of/IN the/DT most/RBS Orange/NNP counties/NNS in/IN Ireland/NNP (Tyrone)--that/CC the/DT violence/NN and/CC licentious/JJ abuses/NNS of/IN these/DT armed/JJ civilians/NNS were/VBD perpetrated/VBN before/IN my/PRP$ eyes--and/NN that/IN the/DT sounds/NNS of/IN their/PRP$ outrages/NNS may/MD be/VB said/VBD still/RB to/TO ring/NN in/IN my/PRP$ ears./NN I/PRP have/VBP written/VBN many/JJ works/NNS upon/IN Irish/JJ life,/NN and/CC up/RB to/TO the/DT present/JJ day/NN the/DT man/NN has/VBZ never/RB lived/VBN who/WP could/MD lay/VB his/PRP$ finger/NN upon/IN any/DT passage/NN of/IN my/PRP$ writings,/NN and/CC say/VB "that/DT is/VBZ false."/IN I/PRP cannot,/MD however,/RB avoid/VB remarking/VBG here,/PRP$ that/WDT within/IN the/DT last/JJ few/JJ years,/NNS a/DT more/RBR enlarged/JJ knowledge/NN of/IN life,/NN and/CC a/DT more/RBR matured/JJ intercourse/NN with/IN society,/NNS have/VBP enabled/VBN me/PRP to/TO overcome/VB many/JJ absurd/JJ prejudices/NNS with/IN which/WDT I/PRP was/VBD imbued./VBN Without/IN compromising,/NN however,/, the/DT _truth/NN or/CC integrity_/NN of/IN any/DT portion/NN of/IN my/PRP$ writings,/NN I/PRP am/VBP willing/JJ to/TO admit,/VB which/WDT I/PRP do/VBP frankly,/RB and/CC without/IN hesitation,/NN that/IN I/PRP published/VBD in/IN my/PRP$ early/JJ works/NNS passages/NNS which/WDT were/VBD not/RB calculated/VBN to/TO do/VB any/DT earthly/RB good;/JJ but,/NN on/IN the/DT contrary,/NN to/TO give/VB unnecessary/JJ offence/NN to/TO a/DT great/JJ number/NN of/IN my/PRP$ countrymen./NN It/PRP is/VBZ due/JJ to/TO myself/PRP to/TO state/VB this,/JJ and/CC to/TO say,/VB that/IN in/IN the/DT last/JJ edition/NN of/IN my/PRP$ works/NNS I/PRP have/VBP left/VBN as/IN many/JJ of/IN these/DT passages/NNS out/IN as/IN I/PRP readily/RB could,/MD without/IN diminishing/VBG the/DT interest,/NN or/CC disturbing/VBG the/DT narrative./JJ _A/NN fortiori_,/IN then,/PRP$ this/DT book/NN may/MD be/VB considered/VBN as/IN full/JJ of/IN truth/NN and/CC fidelity/NN as/IN any/DT I/PRP have/VBP ever/RB written:/VBN and/CC I/PRP must/MD say,/VB that/IN in/IN writing/VBG it/PRP I/PRP have/VBP changed/VBN no/DT principle/NN whatsoever./WP I/PRP am/VBP a/DT liberal/JJ Conservative,/NNP and,/CC I/PRP trust,/VBD a/DT rational/JJ one;/NN but/CC I/PRP am/VBP not,/RB nor/CC ever/RB was,/VBD an/DT Orangeman;/NNP neither/CC can/MD I/PRP endure/VB their/PRP$ exclusive/JJ and/CC arrogant/JJ assumption/NN of/IN loyalty,/NN nor/CC the/DT outrages/NNS which/WDT it/PRP has/VBZ generated./VBN In/IN what/WP portion/NN of/IN my/PRP$ former/JJ writings,/NN for/IN instance,/NN did/VBD I/PRP ever/RB publish/VB a/DT line/NN in/IN their/PRP$ favor,/NN or/CC in/IN favor/NN of/IN any/DT secret/JJ and/CC illegal/JJ confederacy?/NN Again,/RB with/IN regard/NN to/TO the/DT Landlords/NNP and/CC Agents,/NNP have/VBP I/PRP not/RB written/VBN a/DT tale/NN called/VBD the/DT "Poor/NNP Scholar,"/NNP and/CC another/DT called/VBD "Tubber/NNP Derg"?/NNP in/IN both/DT of/IN which/WDT their/PRP$ corruptions/NNS and/CC oppressions/NNS are/VBP exposed./VBN Let/VB it/PRP not/RB be/VB mistaken./VBG The/DT two/CD great/JJ curses/NNS of/IN Ireland/NNP are/VBP bad/JJ Landlords/NNS and/CC bad/JJ Agents,/NNP and/CC in/IN nineteen/CD cases/NNS out/IN of/IN every/DT twenty,/IN the/DT origin/NN of/IN the/DT crime/NN lies/VBZ with/IN the/DT Landlord/NNP or/CC Agent,/NNP instead/RB of/IN the/DT tenant./NN With/IN respect/NN to/TO the/DT Established/NNP Church/NNP of/IN forty/CD years/NNS ago,/IN if/IN there/EX is/VBZ any/DT man/NN living/NN who/WP asserts/VBZ that/IN I/PRP have/VBP not/RB _under-drawn_/JJ her,/, rather/RB than/IN otherwise,/JJ he/PRP is/VBZ less/RBR intimate/JJ with/IN truth/NN than/IN I/PRP could/MD wish./VB On/IN this/DT subject/NN I/PRP challenge/VBP and/CC defy/VBP inquiry./, I/PRP grant/VBP you/PRP she/PRP is/VBZ much/RB changed/VBN for/IN the/DT better/JJR now;/JJ but/CC yet/RB there/EX is/VBZ much/JJ to/TO be/VB done/VBN in/IN her/PRP$ still./NN It/PRP is/VBZ true/JJ Irishmen/NNS at/IN present/JJ get/VB Mitres,/IN a/DT fact/NN which/WDT was/VBD unknown/JJ forty/CD years/NNS ago./. We/PRP have/VBP now/RB more/RBR Evangelicism,/RB and/CC consequently/RB more/RBR sleekness/NN and/CC hypocrisy,/NN more/RBR external/JJ decorum,/NN and,/CC I/PRP would/MD also/RB trust,/VB more/JJR internal/JJ spirituality./NN We/PRP have/VBP now/RB many/JJ eminent/JJ and/CC pious/JJ Prelates/NNS in/IN the/DT Church,/NNP whose/WP$ admirable/JJ example/NN is/VBZ enough/RB even/RB to/TO shame/VB the/DT Clergymen/NNP under/IN them/PRP into/IN a/DT sense/NN of/IN their/PRP$ duty./NN It/PRP is/VBZ to/TO be/VB wished/VBN that/IN we/PRP had/VBD many/JJ more/JJR such/JJ as/IN they,/NN for/IN they/PRP are/VBP wanted./VBN The/DT Irish/JJ Evangelical/NNP party/NN are/VBP certainly/RB very/RB numerous,/JJ and/CC they/PRP must/MD pardon/VB me/PRP a/DT slight/JJ anachronism/NN or/CC two/CD regarding/VBG them,/NN concerning/VBG what/WP has/VBZ been/VBN termed/VBN the/DT Modern/NNP Reformation/NNP in/IN these/DT volumes./NN Are/VBP those/DT who/WP compose/VBP this/DT same/JJ party,/NN by/IN the/DT way,/NN acquainted/VBN with/IN their/PRP$ own/JJ origin?/NN If/IN not,/NN I/PRP will/MD tell/VB them./PRP They/PRP were/VBD begotten/VBN by/IN the/DT active/JJ spirit/NN of/IN the/DT Church/NNP of/IN Rome,/NNP upon/IN their/PRP$ own/JJ establishment,/NN when/WRB she/PRP was/VBD asleep;/RB so/RB that/IN they/PRP owe/VBP their/PRP$ very/JJ existence/NN to/TO those/DT whom/WP they/PRP look/VBP upon/IN as/IN their/PRP$ enemies:/NN and/CC if/IN it/PRP were/VBD only/RB for/IN this/DT reason/NN alone,/IN there/EX ought/MD to/TO be/VB more/RBR peace/NN between/IN them./PRP$ In/IN England/NNP the/DT same/JJ spirit/NN has/VBZ effected/VBN a/DT similar/JJ seduction/NN on/IN that/DT Establishment,/NNP but/CC with/IN this/DT difference,/NN that/IN the/DT Puseyites/NNS are/VBP a/DT much/RB more/RBR obedient/JJ and/CC dutiful/JJ progeny/NN than/IN the/DT Irish/JJ Evangelicals--inasmuch/JJ as/IN they/PRP have/VBP the/DT grace/NN to/TO acknowledge/VB the/DT relationship./NN This/DT book/NN was/VBD written/VBN to/TO exhibit/VB a/DT useful/JJ moral/JJ to/TO the/DT country./NN It/PRP will/MD startle,/VB I/PRP humbly/RB trust,/VBD many/JJ a/DT hard-hearted/JJ Landlord/NNP he/PRP ought/MD not/RB to/TO forget./VB It/PRP will/MD also/RB test/VB the/DT whole/JJ spirit/NN of/IN modern/JJ Conservatism,/NNP and/CC its/PRP$ liberality./NN If/IN there/RB be/VB at/IN the/DT press,/NN or/CC anywhere/RB else,/RB a/DT malignant/JJ bigot,/NNS with/IN great/JJ rancor/NN and/CC little/JJ honesty,/NN it/PRP is/VBZ very/RB likely/JJ he/PRP will/MD attack/VB my/PRP$ book;/NN and/CC this,/DT of/IN course,/NN he/PRP is/VBZ at/IN liberty/NN to/TO do./NN I/PRP deny,/VBP however,/RB that/IN modern/JJ Conservatism/NNP is/VBZ capable/JJ of/IN adopting/VBG or/CC cherishing/VBG to/TO them,/PRP perhaps/RB the/DT recollection/NN of/IN their/PRP$ truth/NN may/MD teach/VB them/PRP a/DT lesson/NN of/IN forbearance/NN and/CC humanity/NN toward/IN those/DT that/WDT differ/VBP from/IN them/PRP in/IN creed,/NN that/WDT may/MD be/VB of/IN important/JJ service/NN to/TO our/PRP$ common/JJ country./NN If/IN so,/NN I/PRP shall/MD have/VB rendered/VBN a/DT service/NN to/TO that/DT country,/NN which,/, as/RB is/VBZ usual,/NNP may/MD probably/RB be/VB recognized/VBN as/IN valuable,/NN when/WRB perhaps/RB my/PRP$ bones/NNS are/VBP mouldering/VBG in/IN the/DT clay,/NN and/CC my/PRP$ ear/NN insensible/JJ to/TO all/DT such/JJ acknowledgments./NN As/IN for,/JJ myself,/NN I/PRP have/VBP been/VBN so/RB completely/RB sickened/VBN by/IN the/DT bigoted/VBN on/IN each/DT side,/NN that/IN I/PRP have/VBP come/VBN to/TO the/DT determination,/NN as/IN every/DT honest/JJ Irishman/NN ought,/NN of/IN knowing/VBG no/DT party/NN but/CC my/PRP$ country,/NN and/CC of/IN devoting/VBG such/JJ talents/NNS as/IN God/NNP has/VBZ given/VBN me,/NNS to/TO the/DT promotion/NN of/IN her/PRP$ general/JJ interests,/NN and/CC the/DT happiness/NN of/IN her/PRP$ whole/JJ people./, Dublin,/JJ December/NNP 24,/CD 1844./. CHAPTER/NNP I.--An/NNP Irish/NNP Pair/NNP and/CC Spoileen/NNP Tent/NNP --A/NNP Marriage/NNP Proposal--An/NNP Under/IN Agent--An/NNP Old/NNP Irish/NNP Squire/NNP and/CC Union/NNP Lord./NNP The/DT town/NN of/IN Castle/NNP Cumber/NNP it/PRP is/VBZ not/RB our/PRP$ intention/NN to/TO describe/VB at/IN more/JJR length/NN than/IN simply/RB to/TO say,/VB that/IN it/PRP consists/VBZ of/IN two/CD long/JJ streets,/NN intersecting/VBG each/DT other,/JJ and/CC two/CD or/CC three/CD lanes/NNS of/IN cabins--many/NN of/IN them/PRP mud/NN ones--that/WDT stretch/NN out/IN of/IN it/PRP on/IN each/DT side/NN at/IN right/JJ angles./NN This/DT street,/NN and/CC these/DT straggling/JJ appendages,/NNS together/RB with/IN a/DT Church,/NNP a/DT Prison,/NNP a/DT Court-house,/JJ a/DT Catholic/NNP chapel,/NN a/DT few/JJ shops,/NN and/CC half/PDT a/DT dozen/NN public/NN houses,/NNS present/JJ to/TO the/DT spectator/NN all/DT the/DT features/NNS that/WDT are/VBP generally/RB necessary/JJ for/IN the/DT description/NN of/IN that/DT class/NN of/IN remote/JJ country/NN towns/NNS of/IN which/WDT we/PRP write./VBP Indeed,/RB with/IN the/DT exception/NN of/IN an/DT ancient/JJ Stone/NNP Cross,/NNP that/IN stands/VBZ in/IN the/DT middle/NN of/IN the/DT street,/NN and/CC a/DT Fair/NNP green,/NN as/IN it/PRP is/VBZ termed,/VBN or/CC common,/VBN where/WRB its/PRP$ two/CD half-yearly/JJ fairs/NNS are/VBP held,/JJ and/CC which/WDT lies/VBZ at/IN the/DT west/JJ end/NN of/IN it,/PRP$ there/EX is/VBZ little/JJ or/CC nothing/NN else/RB to/TO be/VB added./VBN The/DT fair/JJ I/PRP particularly/RB mention,/VBP because/IN on/IN the/DT day/NN on/IN which/WDT the/DT circumstances/NNS I/PRP am/VBP about/RB to/TO describe/VB occurred,/IN a/DT fair/NN was/VBD held/VBN in/IN the/DT town,/NN and/CC upon/IN the/DT green/JJ in/IN question./NN The/DT month/NN was/VBD December--the/DT day/NN stormy/NN and/CC unpropitious./NNP There/EX had/VBD been/VBN a/DT deep/JJ snow/NN and/CC hard/JJ frost/NN for/IN nearly/RB three/CD weeks/NNS before;/IN but/CC now/RB the/DT aspect/NN of/IN the/DT white/JJ earth/NN contrasted/VBD wildly/RB with/IN the/DT large/JJ masses/NNS of/IN black/JJ clouds/NNS which/WDT hung/VBD motionless/JJ in/IN the/DT air,/NN and/CC cast/VBD a/DT dark/JJ and/CC gloomy/JJ spirit/NN not/RB only/RB over/IN the/DT appearance/NN of/IN inanimate/NN nature,/NN but/CC into/IN the/DT heart/NN of/IN man/NN himself./PRP About/RB noon,/RB just/RB when/WRB the/DT whole/JJ fair/NN had/VBD been/VBN assembled,/IN the/DT storm/NN commenced/VBD with/IN wind,/NN sleet,/NN and/CC rain./NN Never/RB was/VBD a/DT more/RBR striking/JJ or/CC unexpected/JJ change/NN produced./NN Women/NNS tucked/VBD up,/RB nearly/RB to/TO the/DT knees,/NNS their/PRP$ garments,/NN soaked/VBN with/IN wet,/JJ clinging/VBG to/TO their/PRP$ bodies/NNS and/CC limbs,/NN as/IN if/IN a/DT part/NN of/IN themselves--men/PRP$ drenched/VBN and/CC buttoned/VBN up/RP to/TO the/DT chin--all/NN splashing/VBG through/IN the/DT slippery/JJ streets,/NN their/PRP$ shoes/NNS spouting/VBG with/IN snow-broth--the/DT falling/VBG of/IN tents--the/DT shouting/VBG against/IN the/DT loudness/NN of/IN the/DT storm,/NN in/IN order/NN to/TO be/VB heard--the/JJ bleating/NN of/IN sheep,/NN lowing/NN of/IN cattle,/NNS the/DT deafening/NN and/CC wild/JJ hum/NN of/IN confused/VBN noises--all,/NN when/WRB added/VBN to/TO the/DT roaring/NN of/IN the/DT sweeping/VBG blast,/NN the/DT merciless/JJ pelting/NN of/IN the/DT rain,/NN and/CC the/DT inclement/JJ character/NN of/IN the/DT whole/JJ day,/NN presented/VBD a/DT scene/NN that/WDT was/VBD tempestuous/JJ and/CC desolate/JJ beyond/IN belief./VBG Age,/NNP decrepid/VBD and/CC shivering--youth,/JJ benumbed/NN and/CC stiffened/VBD with/IN cold--rich/JJ and/CC poor,/JJ man/NN and/CC woman,/NN all/DT had/VBD evidently/RB but/CC one/CD object/NN in/IN view,/NN and/CC that/DT was/VBD shelter./DT Love,/NNP charity,/NN amusement,/NN business,/NN were/VBD all/DT either/RB disappointed/VBN or/CC forced/VBN to/TO suspend/VB their/PRP$ operations,/NN at/IN least/JJS for/IN the/DT present./NN Every/DT one/CD ran/VBD or/CC walked/VBD as/RB quickly/RB as/IN possible,/JJ with/IN the/DT exception/NN of/IN some/DT forenoon/NN drunkard,/NN who/WP staggered/VBD along/RB at/IN his/PRP$ ease,/NN with/IN an/DT eye/NN half/NN indolent/JJ and/CC half/JJ stupid,/NN careless,/NN if/IN not/RB unconscious/JJ of/IN the/DT wild/JJ uproar,/NN both/DT elemental/JJ and/CC otherwise,/JJ by/IN which/WDT he/PRP was/VBD surrounded./VBN Nay,/IN the/DT very/JJ beggars/NNS and/CC impostors--to/JJ whom,/, in/IN general,/JJ severe/JJ weather/NN on/IN such/JJ occasions/NNS is/VBZ a/DT godsend,/NN as/IN it/PRP presents/VBZ them/PRP to/TO their/PRP$ fellow-creatures/NNS in/IN a/DT more/JJR pitiable/JJ aspect--were/NN glad/JJ to/TO disperse./RP In/IN truth,/NN the/DT effect/NN of/IN the/DT storm/NN upon/IN them/PRP was/VBD perfectly/RB miraculous./, Many/JJ a/DT poor/JJ creature,/NN blind/NN from/IN birth/NN or/CC infancy,/NN was/VBD gifted/JJ with,/IN or/CC restored/VBN to/TO excellent/JJ sight;/NN the/DT maimed/VBN were/VBD suddenly/RB cured--the/RB deaf/JJ made/VBN to/TO hear--the/VB dumb/JJ to/TO speak--and/VB the/DT study/NN baccagh,/NN or/CC cripple,/JJ bounded/VBN away,/RB at/IN the/DT rate/NN of/IN six/CD miles/NNS an/DT hour,/NN cursing/VBG the/DT whole/JJ thing/NN as/IN a/DT bad/JJ spec--a/NN dead/JJ failure./NN Solemn/JJ assignations/NNS of/IN long/JJ promise,/NN rustic/JJ courtships,/NN and/CC earnest/JJ match-makings,/NN were/VBD all/DT knocked/VBN up,/NNP unless/IN in/IN case/NN of/IN those/DT who/WP availed/VBD themselves/PRP of/IN the/DT early/JJ part/NN of/IN the/DT day./NN Time/NN and/CC place,/NN in/IN fact,/NN were/VBD completely/RB forgotten/VBN by/IN the/DT parties,/NN each/DT being/VBG anxious/JJ only/RB to/TO secure/VB the/DT nearest/JJS and/CC most/RBS commodious/JJ shelter./NN Nay,/. though/IN ashamed/JJ to/TO write/VB it,/IN we/PRP are/VBP bound/VBN to/TO confess/VB that/IN some/DT of/IN our/PRP$ countrymen/NNS were/VBD ungallant/JJ enough,/RB on/IN meeting/NN with/IN their/PRP$ sweethearts,/JJ fairly/RB to/TO give/VB them/PRP the/DT slip,/NN or/CC only/RB to/TO recognize/VB them/PRP with/IN a/DT kind/NN of/IN dreary/JJ and/CC equivocal/JJ salutation,/NNS that/WDT might/MD be/VB termed/VBN a/DT cross/NN between/IN a/DT wink/NN and/CC a/DT shiver./NN Others,/JJ however,/RB gallantly/RB and/CC magnanimously/RB set/VBN the/DT tempest/NN at/IN defiance,/NN or/CC blessed/VBN their/PRP$ stars/NNS for/IN sending/VBG them/PRP an/DT opportunity/NN of/IN sitting/VBG so/RB close/JJ to/TO their/PRP$ fair/JJ inamoratas,/NN in/IN order/NN that/IN their/PRP$ loving/JJ pressure/NN might,/, in/IN some/DT degree,/NN aided/VBN by/IN a/DT glass/NN of/IN warm/JJ punch,/NN compensate/VB the/DT sweet/JJ creatures/NNS for/IN the/DT unexpected/JJ drenching/NN they/PRP had/VBD got./DT It/PRP has/VBZ been/VBN well/RB observed,/JJ that/IN there/EX is/VBZ no/DT class/NN of/IN life/NN in/IN which/WDT instances/NNS of/IN great/JJ virtue/NN and/CC fortitude/NN may/MD not/RB be/VB found;/VBN and/CC the/DT Justness/NNP of/IN the/DT apothegm/NN was/VBD fully/RB corroborated/VBN here./PRP Cold,/NNP bitter/JJ and/CC tempestuous/JJ and/CC terrible/JJ as/IN was/VBD the/DT day,/NN amidst/IN rain,/NN wind,/NN sleet,/NN and/CC hail,/NN there/EX might/MD be/VB seen,/VBN in/IN a/DT thoroughfare/NN about/IN the/DT centre/NN of/IN the/DT town,/NN a/DT cripple,/NN apparently/RB paralytic/JJ from/IN the/DT middle/NN down,/RB seated/VBN upon/IN the/DT naked/JJ street,/NN his/PRP$ legs/NNS stretched/VBD out/RP before/IN him,/PRP hirpling/VBG onward;/VBN by/IN alternately/RB twisting/VBG his/PRP$ miserable/JJ body/NN from/IN right/JJ to/TO left;/VB while,/, as/IN if/IN the/DT softer/JJR sex/NN were/VBD not/RB to/TO be/VB surpassed/VBN in/IN feats/NNS of/IN hardihood/NN or/CC heroism,/IN a/DT tattered/JJ creature,/NN in/IN the/DT shape/NN of/IN woman,/NN without/IN cap,/NN shoe,/NN or/CC stocking,/NN accompanied/VBN by/IN two/CD naked/JJ and/CC shivering/VBG children,/NNS whose/WP$ artificial/JJ lamentations/NNS were/VBD now/RB lost/VBN in/IN those/DT of/IN nature,/NNS proceeded/VBD up/IN the/DT street,/NN in/IN the/DT very/JJ teeth/NNS of/IN the/DT beating/VBG tempest,/RB attempting/VBG to/TO sing/VB some/DT dismal/JJ ditty,/NN with/IN a/DT voice/NN which/WDT resembled/VBD the/DT imagined/VBN shriekings/NNS of/IN a/DT ghoul,/NN more/RBR than/IN the/DT accents/NNS of/IN a/DT human/JJ being./NN These/DT two/CD were/VBD the/DT only/JJ individuals/NNS who,/, in/IN the/DT true/JJ spirit/NN of/IN hardened/JJ imposture,/JJ braved/VBN all/PDT the/DT fury/NN of/IN the/DT In/IN this,/DT however,/NN we/PRP do/VBP not/RB blame/VB England,/JJ but/CC agree/VBP with/IN Dean/NNP Swift/NNP who/WP asserted,/VBP that/IN in/IN his/PRP$ day,/NN she/PRP uniformly/RB selected/VBD however,/RB that/IN as/RB soon/RB as/IN they/PRP had/VBD reached/VBN Hounslow/NNP Heath,/NNP they/PRP were/VBD every/DT man,/NN without/IN exception,/JJ stopped,/NN stripped,/NN and/CC robbed,/NN that/IN dish,/NN Dick./NNP Never/RB mind--you/, can/MD feed/VB upon/IN a/DT fat/JJ living--or/NN if/IN one/CD won't/NN do--why,/JJ we/PRP must/MD see/VB and/CC get/VB you/PRP a/DT pair/NN of/IN father,/NN for/IN you--whish!/JJ I'm/NNP rantin'/NN Regan/NNP from/IN sweet/JJ Anghadarra!"/NNP So/RB saying,/VBP poor,/JJ idle,/JJ drinking,/NN negligent,/NN pugnacious/JJ Regan,/RB by/IN his/PRP$ of/IN your/PRP$ duty,/NN to/TO your/PRP$ own/JJ sense/NN of/IN honesty/NN and/CC justice./RB _Do/VB not,/RB however,/RB take/VB harsh/JJ or/CC sudden/JJ steps_./NN In/IN the/DT meantime/NN lose/VBP
